name: Card Elements for WPBakery
author: Techeshta

sections.description:
Card Elements for WPBakery is an effective and user-friendly way to showcase your team profiles (our team), testimonials (your client’s reviews), recipe, listing, tours WordPress posts in multiple ways, and unique card-style/design. It is a flexible and straightforward way to add new elements/widgets to WPBakery page builder. Plus, it’s one of the best plugins for a WordPress website to attract more visitors. It’s easy to manage for beginners to website developers.

Card Elements for WPBakery plugin bundled with precisely designed 2+ most valuable elements to showcase/decorate your website with card styling. We will keep adding more in future versions.

If you are looking for a card presentation design, then Card Elements for WPBakery is the best solution you have ever seen above. Our goal is to deliver the ultimate experience to our loyal users.

Where is the Card Elements for WPBakery plugin useful?

Card Elements for WPBakery helpful plugin for all WordPress websites. Below is one small list for which purposes you can start using the card elements plugin.

  • You can decorate your blog post in various styles.
  • Showcase your customer reviews in attractive ways.
  • Decorate your tour and travel packages differently.
  • You can design your recipe card in minutes.
  • Present your listing card in unique ways.
  • Various profile card styles to show your profile in unique ways.
  • Easy to show team profile on any post or page.
  • Best card styles to showcase your client’s reviews.
  • Easily change the look of your card elements.
  • Etc.

Ready-made Card Elements

We have designed the 2+ most valuable elements to showcase/decorate your website with card styling. It allows you to climb the top of your design capabilities.

1. Profile Card

There are 5+ unique card styles for your Profile Card, which make your profile more pretty.

2. Testimonial Card

There are 2+ unique card styles for Testimonial Cards. You can easily change your style.

3. Post Card

There are 2+ unique card styles available for your Postcard.

Showcase your listing or places information in 2+ unique card styles

Many more are coming soon.

Technical Support

We’re active for any support issues and feature suggestions. So, I hope you will love it. If you have any more questions, visit our support on the Plugin’s Forum. Feel free to contact us if you want any custom widgets for your site.

Note: This plugin is a widget of WPBakery Page Builder and will only work with the WPBakery page builder installed.

Like Card Elements for WPBakery Plugin?

  • Don’t forget to rate us on WordPress ðŸ™‚
sections.installation:
From Your WordPress Dashboard

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New.
  2. Search for Card Elements for WPBakery.
  3. Click on the Install Now button.
  4. Click on Activate Now after installed in the backend.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download Card Elements for WPBakery.
  2. Upload the ‘card-elements-for-wpbakery’ folder to the /wp-content/plugins/directory.
  3. Activate Card Elements for WPBakery plugin from your plugins page.
sections.faq:
Can I add multiple card elements to a single page?

Yes, you can. Card Elements for WPBakery plugin allows you to add multiple card styles on the same page. You need to drag and drop that module various times and select different card styles, whatever you want.

Can I change color or customize the card style as per my wish?

Yes, you can customize it. We provided all possible options in the backend to update it from default card elements.

Does Card Elements for WPBakery give me total control of my card styles?

Yes, Card Elements for WPBakery gives you total control of your card styles. You need to set up everything correctly and play with it. You may get more than your expectations.

Where can I ask for help?

You can reach out via the official support forum on WordPress.org.
